Author: arabella_05
Text: YES of course you can. bed is my lover/enemy and i will tell you the one thing that guarantees a binge for me is attempting to fast. i do high restricting with a lot of low cal snacks and diet energy drinks and it works for me, fasting will only lead you to intense binges and more self loathing. i totally feel you girl, it's an uphill battle every single fucking day and it's so exhausting. i'm trying to lose 20lbs i put on binging at Christmas and somehow it feels so much harder than before. like my body forgot what good food tastes like and now can't go back to shitty snack bars lol. lots of love and take care of yourself friend ðŸ’•ðŸ’•
